sentences.english: The hospital has three hundred beds.
Berths on steamships can be booked a long while in advance.
sentences.chinese: 轮船上的床位可以提前多日预订。

sentences.english: Results The quality control chart was made for estimating sickbed work.
sentences.chinese: 结果制成便于床位工作评价的质控图。

sentences.english: The ship was outfitted with a 12-bed hospital.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船配置了一所有12个床位的医院。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of the application of sickbed capitation in clinical attendance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨床位包干制管理在临床护理中应用的效果。

sentences.english: For example there are hatches which open from bed-coves into the central space.
sentences.chinese: 例如在空间中央开口开放凹床位。

sentences.english: Sorry, all the beds have been engaged. Please wait a moment.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，床位暂时已满，请您稍候片刻。

sentences.english: Objective In order to study the use of the index of sickbed utilization in assessment of sickbed work.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨应用病床利用指数对床位工作进行评价。

sentences.english: Please pay the deposit along with the form to have your room reserved.
sentences.chinese: 使用本表申请者，须先缴付订金，方得保留床位。
一个有30个床位的产科病房。

sentences.english: All hospital beds should be allocated on the basis of need.
sentences.chinese: 所有医院床位都应该按需分配。

sentences.english: Existing observation bed 18, the heavy card rescues bed 2.
sentences.chinese: 现有观察床位18张，重证抢救床位2张。

sentences.english: Existing observation bed 18, the heavy card rescues bed 2.
sentences.chinese: 现有观察床位18张，重证抢救床位2张。

sentences.english: China has relatively small number of beds under three different ministries.
sentences.chinese: 在三个不同的政府领导下，中国的床位数相对较少。

definition: standard (hotel) room/two-person room of standard size and amenities/abbr. to 标间
abbr. for 標準間|标准间[biao1 zhun3 jian1], standard (hotel) room
hotel room with one double (or queen or king) bed
